name: Cheer Residences
cardAddress: McArthur Hi-Way, Brgy. Ibayo, Marilao, Bulacan
cardDescription: Start afresh in a home that inspires you to have the best beginning fitting for your life. Experience daily happiness and joy here at Cheer Residences, a luxurious yet affordable home for those who seek comfort and convenience.
bannerAbout: Explore and experience a full suite of amenities here at Cheer Residences. Choosing activities for rest and relaxation is made easy with a wide array of options available. The clubhouse is appointed with several features and the swimming pool is sure to become a popular place among friends and families. Have the space for fun and rest right within this complete community.
bannerFeatures: Mail Boxes in Lift lounge per Building
Centralized Garbage Collection and Disposal System
Standby Generator Set for Common Areas and Select Unit Outlets
bannerAmenities: Entrance Water Feature and Club House
Adult Pool and Childrens Wading Pool

name: Cheerful Homes
cardDescription: Come home to SMDC Cheerful Homes, the sure and wise choice. It is strategically located in Mabalacat, Pampanga and has its very own commercial area and transportation hub for your convenience. Plus, get 24-hour security for the safety of the family.
bannerAbout: The modern home should give you more than just shelter; it should be your sanctuary, and where your life begins. At SMDC Cheerful Homes in Mabalacat, Pampanga, you can finally say, “I belong.” Aside from a beautiful, affordable home where you can rest and relax, this is also your ideal community—a place where you can reach out and connect with others, bring up a family, and settle down in comfort and convenience.
bannerFeatures: 2Over a hectare of amenity area means a vast space that allows residents with their families and friends to bond in endless ways. From a community clubhouse with a swimming pool, a basketball court, and a multipurpose recreational court, SMDC Cheerful Homes provides a host of amenities that let you experience the good life. Our nature park also lets you walk among the greenery and find quiet restoration on its tree-lined paths. And whether you love to take leisurely strolls or you're training for fitness, our jogging and bike trails let you enhance your physical well-being.
bannerAmenities: Over a hectare of amenity area means a vast space that allows residents with their families and friends to bond in endless ways. From a community clubhouse with a swimming pool, a basketball court, and a multipurpose recreational court, SMDC Cheerful Homes provides a host of amenities that let you experience the good life. Our nature park also lets you walk among the greenery and find quiet restoration on its tree-lined paths. And whether you love to take leisurely strolls or you’re training for fitness, our jogging and bike trails let you enhance your physical well-being

name: Green Residences
cardAddress: Taft Ave., Malate, City of Manila
cardDescription: De La Salle University on Taft Avenue, its amenities include a study hall and a multi-purpose area that allow for its residents to focus on their studies and work towards a bright future.
bannerAbout: Start them young, on their way to stellar heights in SMDC's Green Residences. Located right beside De La Salle University on Taft Avenue, its amenities include a study hall and a multi-purpose area that allow for its residents to focus on their studies and work towards a bright future
bannerFeatures: Automatic Fire Detection and Alarm System
Standby Generator Set for Common Areas & Select Unit Outlets
Garbage Disposal Area on Every Floor

name: Green2 Residences
cardDescription: Green 2 Residences is located in a bustling community advantageous to students looking for a place to call their own. This three-tower development has 19 floors featuring its own commercial area and well-designed amenities that offer conducive environment for a balanced work-and-play lifestyle.
bannerAbout: Start them young, on their way to stellar heights in SMDC's green2 Residences. Located right beside De La Salle University on Taft Avenue, its amenities include a study hall and a multi-purpose area that allow for its residents to focus on their studies and work towards a bright future.
bannerAmenities: The well-planned amenities are designed to create a nurturing, safe and secure space. Thrive in an environment that lets you focus on achieving goals while providing you with options for a much-needed leisure time. There are features that create a conducive environment for studying and downtime while other areas are dedicated for a more active routine.

name: Hope Residences
cardDescription: Hope Residences is the much awaited addition to the newest lifestyle district of Trece Martires. This is the first vertical residential development in the area that offers a life of comfort and convenience.
bannerAbout: Hope Residences is the much awaited addition to the newest lifestyle district of Trece Martires. This is the first vertical residential development in the area that offers a life of comfort and convenience.
bannerFeatures: CCTV at Ground Floor Lobbies, Lift Lobbies and Elevators
Centralized Garbage Disposal Room on Every Floor

name: Lush Residences
cardDescription: Located in Makati, the country's leading financial and central business district, enjoy the city's premier shopping destination, parks, museums and art galleries, performance and cultural centers.
bannerAbout: Designed to inspire balance and tranquility, its plush interiors, verdant green spaces and fitness facilities makes it more than just a home, it's a retreat.
bannerFeatures: Generator Sets for Common Areas and Selected Residential Outlets
Provision for telecom and cable lines

name: Shore Residences
cardAddress: Seaside blvd. cor. Sunrise Drive, MOA, Pasay City
cardDescription: Conveniently located at the SM Mall of Asia Complex in Pasay City, Shore Residences offers the finest in resort living, with an exclusive beach-like amenity right at the heart of the development.
bannerAbout: Conveniently located at the SM Mall of Asia Complex in Pasay City, Shore Residences offers the finest in resort living, with an exclusive beach-like amenity right at the heart of the development. Everything is within reach from the numerous shops and dining spots at SM Mall of Asia, to the thriving array of activities and attractions in the Entertainment City. Enjoy leisure at its best at Shore Residences
bannerFeatures: 5 Elevators each for Towers A&B; 12 Elevators for Tower C; 10 Elevators for Tower D
Automatic Fire Detection and Alarm System
Standby Generator Set for Common Areas & Select Unit Outlets

name: Shore3 Residences
cardAddress: Seaside blvd. cor. Sunrise Drive, MOA, Pasay City
cardDescription: Conveniently located at the SM Mall of Asia Complex in Pasay City, Shore Residences offers the finest in resort living, with an exclusive beach-like amenity right at the heart of the development.
bannerAbout: Shore Residences is the first and biggest Premier Beach Island Development of SM Prime Holdings| SMDC at the centre of the Entertainment City Manila. With a unique concept designs where Life's pleasure can be found right at your own private island called 'Home'. ​Shore Residences pampers you to enjoy a summer vibe life in the beach experience that makes you want to stay and just chill.

name: Vine Residences
cardAddress: Brgy. San Bartolome, Novaliches, Quezon City
cardDescription: Vast open greenery. Secluded sunken gardens. Calm expansive pools. These are just a few of the amenities enclosed within the gated community of SMDC's Vine Residences. Located within the SM City Novaliches complex
bannerAbout: MORE THAN JUST A HOME Vast open greenery. Secluded sunken gardens. Calm expansive pools. These are just a few of the amenities enclosed within the gated community of SMDC's Vine Residences. Located within the SM City Novaliches complex, it offers lifestyle unlike any other in the area. Here, homes lie amongst rolling grassy spaces for a quiet and relaxed ambiance. While entertainment, convenience, and a transportation hub are found in the mall next door. At Vine Residences, you get more than just a home, you get a lifestyle.
bannerFeatures: Stand by Generator set for Common Areas & Select Unit Outlets
